result.execSummary:
Daron Michael Rumley was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Daron Michael Rumley was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daron Michael Rumley

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Certification of transcript of proceedings of HEARING commencing APRIL 10, 2015 received and filed. (16 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to PD.

Defendant Daron Michael Rumley in court with attorney Sergio Magana.  Defendant Daron Michael Rumley in custody.  James C. Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant previously waived extradition.  Defendant will be extradited at conclusion of his sentence.   Case closed.

Defendant Daron Michael Rumley in court with attorney Sergio Magana.  Defendant Daron Michael Rumley in custody.  Benjamin Andrew Wesson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Governor's warrant served on defendant.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Any outstanding warrants in Illinois quashed.  Court ordered the defendant remanded into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.

  Status conference scheduled for May 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Sergio Magana in court, defendant Daron Michael Rumley not in court, in custody.  Nicholas Steven Cerwin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Daron Michael Rumley in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Daron Michael Rumley in custody.  Karen A. Loebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Pocan, Branch 26.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Illinois.  Defendant contested extradition.  Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
